data.name: Crystal Pair
data.desc: When a "Crystal Beast" monster you control is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Place 1 "Crystal Beast" monster from your Deck face-up in your Spell & Trap Card Zone as a Continuous Spell Card, then you take no Battle Damage for the rest of this turn.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack
Structure Deck: Legend of the Crystal Beasts
